description: Contains information about payer sheet records. These include the name, National Council for Prescription Drug Programs (NCPDP) version, and the date the record was created. Payer sheets are used by Willow Ambulatory during prescription copay adjudication.

columns.name: PAYOR_SHEET_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the payor sheet record.

columns.name: RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of this payor sheet
